scripts.network:deploy: cdk deploy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.todoapp.cdk.NetworkApp" -c sslCertificateArn=arn:aws:acm:us-east-2:"281448583808":certificate/${CERTIFICATE_ID} -c environmentName=${ENVIRONMENT_NAME} -c accountId=281448583808 -c region=us-east-2 --require-approval never
scripts.network:destroy: cdk destroy --app "./mvnw -e -q compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=dev.stratospheric.todoapp.cdk.NetworkApp" -c sslCertificateArn=arn:aws:acm:us-east-2:281448583808:certificate/${CERTIFICATE_ID} -c environmentName=${ENVIRONMENT_NAME} -c accountId=281448583808 -c region=us-east-2 --force --require-approval never
